text: Allan Knorr (23 September 1927 – 28 October 2002) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:2002 deaths Category:1927 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Ivanhoe Amateurs Football Club players
title: Allan Knorr
